item.title: 墨西哥消费者物价在利率决定前升幅超预期
item.description: 墨西哥上个月的总体通胀率略高于预期，这可能会巩固央行在周四晚些时候召开的货币政策会议上维持利率不变的立场。【原文：Mexico’s headline inflation sped up slightly more than expected last month, likely cementing a rate hold at the central bank’s monetary policy meeting later on Thursday.】

item.title: 贝索斯、扎克伯格领衔七大内幕人士抛售股票事件
item.description: 七大科技公司的内部人士正在追随杰夫-贝索斯和马克-扎克伯格，从这些在很大程度上推动了美国股市繁荣的股票中获取收益。【原文：Insiders at the Magnificent Seven tech companies are following Jeff Bezos and Mark Zuckerberg in realizing gains from the stocks that have largely powered the boom in US equity markets.】

item.title: 博茨瓦纳誓言保护必和必拓与安格鲁潜在交易中的利益
item.description: 如果必和必拓集团（BHP Group Ltd.）收购英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc），博茨瓦纳总统莫克韦齐-马西西（Mokgweetsi Masisi）誓言保护本国利益，包括其在钻石巨头戴比尔斯公司（De Beers）15%的股份。【原文：Botswana President Mokgweetsi Masisi vowed to protect the country’s interests, including its 15% stake in diamond giant De Beers, should BHP Group Ltd. acquire Anglo American Plc.】

item.title: 瑞士信贷在日内瓦被格鲁吉亚大亨起诉索赔 2.2 亿美元
item.description: 格鲁吉亚亿万富翁比季纳-伊万尼什维利（Bidzina Ivanishvili）就瑞士信贷集团（Credit Suisse）的 "流氓交易员 "丑闻起诉瑞士信贷集团，索赔2亿瑞士法郎（约合2.2亿美元）。【原文：Georgian billionaire Bidzina Ivanishvili sued Credit Suisse for 200 million Swiss francs ($220 million) Geneva over a rogue trader scandal, in a suit that goes beyond the $1.34 billion he’s already been awarded by courts in Bermuda and Singapore.】

item.title: 英国 ISA 每年可向萎靡不振的股市注入 40 亿英镑资金
item.description: Peel Hunt Ltd.的分析显示，政府提出的投资英国公司的免税储蓄账户建议每年可为股市增加 40 亿英镑（50 亿美元）的资金，有助于抵消创纪录的资金外流。【原文：The government’s proposal for a tax-free savings account for investing in UK companies could pump an additional £4 billion ($5 billion) a year into the stock market, helping to counter record outflows, according to an analysis by Peel Hunt Ltd.】

item.title: 美联储令市场陷入困境，顶级债券预测者意见分歧
item.description: 安舒尔-普拉丹（Anshul Pradhan）和斯蒂芬-斯坦利（Stephen Stanley）都预见到了当前美国债券市场的到来。只是他们对市场走向的看法并不一致。【原文：Anshul Pradhan and Stephen Stanley both saw the current US bond market coming. They just don’t agree on where it’s going.】

item.title: 什么是黄金签证？在哪里还能获得黄金签证？
item.description: 如果另一个国家的政府不希望你去那里，那么试图到达那里就会变得前所未有的困难和危险。2023 年，移民在寻找新生活的过程中丧生的人数创下了历史新高，而当时各国政府在边境执法方面的花费也创下了历史新高。【原文：It’s never been so difficult or dangerous to try to reach another country if its government doesn’t want you there. A record number of migrants died in their search for a new life in 2023, when governments spent record sums on border enforcement.】

item.description:
需求增长将降温，供应激增将远远满足需求增长。【原文：

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德公司首席执行官弗拉特认为交易正在增加，利润上升
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德公司公布的可分配利润增长了 5%，超过了分析师的预期，原因是其保险业务利润的增长帮助抵消了布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）的疲软。【原文：Brookfield Corp. posted a 5% increase in distributable earnings, beating analysts’ estimates, as higher profits in its insurance business helped offset a soft patch for Brookfield Asset Management.】

item.title: 拉姆斯登加入宽松阵营，英国央行更接近降息
item.description: 在第二位决策者投票支持降低借贷成本后，英格兰银行距离将利率从 16 年高点下调的目标越来越近，行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）表示，他 "对事情正朝着正确的方向发展感到乐观"。【原文：The Bank of England edged closer to cutting interest rates from a 16-year high after a second policymaker voted for lower borrowing costs and Governor Andrew Bailey said he was “optimistic that things are moving in the right direction.”】

item.title: 3 万亿美元资产堆带来的负担引发了对 IPO 替代方案的探索
item.description: 随着首次公开募股市场在经历了两年的沉寂后反弹，苦苦等待回报的投资者终于得到了一些回报。【原文：As the market for initial public offerings bounces back after two lifeless years, investors who’ve been impatiently waiting for their payoff are finally getting some returns.】

item.title: 前高盛银行家因涉嫌在加纳行贿而被引渡
item.description: 一名前高盛集团银行家对英国将其引渡到美国的决定提出上诉，他在美国面临着在为该投资银行工作时贿赂加纳官员的指控。【原文：An ex-Goldman Sachs Group Inc. banker appealed a UK decision to extradite him to the US where he faces accusations of bribing Ghanaian officials when he worked for the investment bank.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。随着财报季的结束，欧洲股市纷纷走低，股票期货也随之走低。同时，市场在等待降息的进一步信号，英国央行今天的会议近在眼前。以下是您需要了解的其他信息 -- Morwenna Coniam【原文：Good morning. Stock futures are following European shares lower amid a spattering of lackluster outlooks as earnings season winds up. Meanwhile markets await further signals on interest rate cuts, with the Bank of England’s meeting today in close view. Here’s what else you need to know -- Morwenna Coniam】

item.title: 阿提哈德航空季度利润创纪录，有望首次公开募股
item.description: 阿联酋国家航空公司阿提哈德航空公司（Etihad Airways PJSC）报告称，在旅游需求激增的情况下，该公司 2024 年第一季度的利润创下了 "历史新高"，该公司正在为可能的首次公开募股做准备。【原文：Etihad Airways PJSC reported a “record” profit in the first quarter of 2024 amid surging demand for travel, as the United Arab Emirates’s national airline prepares for a possible initial public offering.】

item.title: 越南在泄密调查中拘留外交部官员
item.description: 劳动部一名被视为主张工会应具有一定独立性的高级官员因涉嫌故意泄露国家机密而被拘留。【原文：A senior labor ministry official seen as advocating for some independence of trade unions has been detained over allegations of deliberately disclosing state secrets.】

item.title: 审计长称纽约市 MTA 资本计划需要 250 亿美元
item.description: 据纽约州主计长称，美国最大的公共交通服务提供商纽约大都会运输局在未来基础设施升级方面可能面临 250 亿美元的资金缺口，以改善地铁服务并加强其系统抵御极端天气事件的能力。【原文：The New York Metropolitan Transportation Authority, the nation’s largest mass-transit provider, faces a potential $25 billion funding shortfall on future infrastructure upgrades to improve subway service and strengthen its system against extreme weather events, according to New York’s comptroller.】

item.title: 墨西哥和秘鲁可能对降息决定意见分歧：日间指南
item.description: 据预测，拉丁美洲两家以通胀为目标的主要央行将在周四的会议上从其最新的消费者价格报告中汲取教训，其中墨西哥几乎肯定会选择暂停，而秘鲁则将连续第二次降息。【原文：Two of Latin America’s main inflation-targeting central banks meeting Thursday are forecast to take their cues from their most recent consumer price reports, with Mexico all but certainly opting for a pause and Peru set to deliver a second straight interest rate cut.】

item.title: 日本前大臣称无人机拍摄航母视频问题严重
item.description: 一位前防卫大臣告诉记者，无人机在限制空域拍摄的日本旗舰航空母舰特写镜头据说在网上流传，这构成了 "严重的安全问题"。【原文：Close-up footage of Japan’s flagship aircraft carrier taken by a drone in restricted airspace and reportedly circulated online constitutes a “serious security problem,” a former defense minister told reporters.】

item.title: 索尼计划与 Blackstone、KKR 竞购价值 13 亿美元的漫画应用程序
item.description: 索尼音乐娱乐公司正准备与私募股权投资基金黑石公司（Blackstone Inc.）【原文：Sony Music Entertainment is preparing a bid against private equity funds Blackstone Inc. and KKR & Co. to acquire Japanese e-comics provider Infocom Corp. in a deal estimated to be worth around ¥200 billion ($1.3 billion).】

item.title: 非洲数据泄露中心银行计划 IPO 重塑形象
item.description: BGFIBank Group S.A.是非洲中部最大的银行之一，该公司正在重启首次股票出售计划，作为恢复因大规模数据泄露而受损的形象的更广泛努力的一部分。【原文：BGFIBank Group S.A., one of central Africa’s largest banks, is reviving a plan for an initial share sale as part of a wider push to restore an image marred by a massive data leak.】

item.title: 恶劣天气和战争使世界小麦供应紧张
item.description: 恶劣的天气和战争有可能使世界小麦供应持续紧张，粮食成本上升的幽灵再次出现。【原文：Bad weather and war are threatening to keep the world’s wheat supplies under strain and reviving the specter of rising food costs.】

item.title: 巴西历史性洪灾为卢拉总统任期创造了 "卡特里娜时刻
item.description: 周日，巴西总统路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）飞越了淹没巴西南部地区的洪水，他看到的不仅仅是造成至少 100 人死亡、16 万人流离失所的灾难，更是他总统任期内的决定性时刻。【原文：When Brazil’s Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva flew over the floods that have submerged the southern part of his country on Sunday, he surveyed not just the devastation that has left at least 100 people dead and 160,000 displaced but a defining moment for his presidency.】

item.title: 印度国家银行在贷款收入增长的情况下实现利润增长
item.description: 由于贷款收入持续强劲，印度国家银行的季度利润超过了预期。【原文：State Bank of India’s quarterly profits surpassed estimates as lending income continues to be strong.】

item.title: 香港房屋与市镇重建组织进行罕见的贷款谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，两家与政府密切合作的香港机构正在与金融中心的银行进行罕见的银团贷款谈判。【原文：Two Hong Kong bodies that work closely with the government are in rare talks with banks in the financial hub for syndicated loans, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 香港新房销售额达 54 亿美元，创历史新高
item.description: 由于政府取消了对房地产的限制，买家纷纷涌入市场，香港 4 月份的新房销售量飙升至历史新高。【原文：New home sales in Hong Kong surged to a record high in April, as buyers rushed to the market after the government removed property curbs.】

item.title: 特斯拉在华加大裁员力度，因销售放缓受到影响
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，特斯拉公司在中国的裁员行动正在升级，因为埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）面临着越来越大的压力，要在全球最大的汽车市场赢回份额。【原文：Tesla Inc.’s job cuts are escalating in China, according to people familiar with the matter, as Elon Musk contends with growing pressure to win back share in the world’s biggest auto market.】

item.title: 印度中央银行酝酿变革，可再生能源成本或将增加
item.description: 据一家顶级咨询公司称，印度央行关于项目融资的建议可能会使可再生能源项目的借贷成本增加多达 1 个百分点，从而可能导致该国风能和太阳能发电价格上涨。【原文：The Indian central bank’s proposals on project financing may add as much as 1 percentage point to the borrowing costs of renewables projects, according to a top consultancy firm, potentially causing a hike in wind and solar power prices in the country.】

item.title: 土耳其中央银行上调影响政策的通胀预期
item.description: 土耳其中央银行上调了年底的通胀预期，这一出人意料的举动凸显了该行在将物价增长从目前近 70% 的水平上放缓方面所面临的挑战。【原文：Turkey’s central bank raised its year-end inflation forecast, a surprise move that underscores the challenge it faces in slowing price growth from its current level of almost 70%.】
